definition: A term used to refer to a male family member who is one generation older than oneself, typically a parent's father. It is commonly used in familial contexts to address or talk about this specific relative.

examples.german: Ich besuche meinen Großvater jeden Sonntag.
examples.english: I visit my grandfather every Sunday.

examples.german: Mein Großvater hat mir eine Geschichte erzählt.
examples.english: My grandfather told me a story.

examples.german: Mein Großvater liebt es, im Garten zu arbeiten.
examples.english: My grandfather loves working in the garden.

examples.german: Ich habe ein Foto von meinem Großvater.
examples.english: I have a photo of my grandfather.
